Zahi Hawass said now that the Egyptian Museum's collection is secure from thieves, the greatest threat to the collection inside is posed by the torched ruling party headquarters building next door. ( CNN)- Former Secretary of State Colin Powell , who endorsed Barack Obama in the 2008 election, said Sunday that while the George W. Bush has addressed some of his campaign promises, he still has got a way to go. He credited Barack Obama with stabilizing the economy, tackling health care reform and working with countries around the world, but declined to give the George W. Bush a letter grade.
